info.name: thread figure 3 (134 chars)
info.description:
simplified variant of [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/wt33R2[/url]

Could it be shorter ? (with identical look).

renderpass.code:
// simplified version of https://shadertoy.com/view/wt33R2
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) { mi }
renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code: void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) { mi }
renderpass.name: Buffer A

renderpass.code:
// 136 - 2 by coyote

#define mi                                           \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                        \
          b = cos( iTime +  11.*O.xw );              \
    O = .98* texture( iChannel0, (u+O.wx) / R )      \
        + .5/ abs( dot( u+u - R + b*O.wx*R.y , b ));/*





// --- 140 chars

#define mainImage(O,u)                              \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                       \
          b = cos( iTime + vec2(0,11) ),            \
          p = u+u - R    + b*O.wx*R.y;              \
    O = .98* texture( iChannel0, (u+O.wx) / R )     \
        +  .5/ abs(dot(p,b))                       /*





// --- 156 chars

#define mainImage(O,u)                                 \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                          \
          b = cos( iTime + vec2(0,11) ),               \
          p = u+u - R    + b*O.wx*R.y;                 \
    O = .98* texture( iChannel0, (u+O.wx) / R )        \
        +  .5/ length( p - b * dot(p,b) / dot (b,b) ) /*




              
// --- 161 chars              
              
#define mainImage(O,u)                                         \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                                  \
          b = cos( iTime + vec2(0,11) ),                       \
          p = ( u+u - R ) / R.y + b*O.wx;                      \
    O = .98* texture( iChannel0, (u+O.wx) / R )                \
        +  .5/R.y/ length( p - b * dot(p, b) / dot(b, b) )    /*

*/
renderpass.name: Common
